summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5714 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 35, Loch Gilvra Addition, and Block 25, Supplement to J. J. McGilvra's 3rd Addition, being the alley between 42nd Avenue North and 43rd Avenue North, from East Newton Street to East Lynn Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75521, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
